form.name: diarrhoea_with_severe_dehydration
form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: Assessment of Child: Main Symptoms: Diarrhoea> Diarrhoea with Severe Dehydration

field.name: Lethargic or unconscious | Sunken eyes | Not able to drink or drinking poorly | Skin pinch does back very slowly.
Take Action: Diarrhoea with Severe Dehydration
Counsel mother on pre-referral treatment and Referral and Refer
Check for the presence, rate and rhythm of the pulses
Observe the respiratory rate and pattern.

Perform cardiopulmonary resuscitation [CPR] if child is Unconscious and NOT BREATHING. After CPR, Place the patient in the Sim’s position with head supported to prevent aspiration in case of Vomiting.
Fill out Referral Form & Refer the child to a health center or hospital IMMEDIATELY
Prepare ORS
Advise mother to be giving frequent sips of ORS one the way to higher health facility, if child can take sips
Advise mother to continue breastfeeding if still breastfeeding
Administer appropriate pre-referral treatment after assessment and document.
Call health provider taking up care and arrange transport
Fill out Referral Form & Refer the child to a health center or hospital IMMEDIATELY
While waiting for transport:
Advise mother to not put the child on her back
Teach mother how to keep the child warm on the way to the health facility
Observe mother breastfeeding and counsel her on positioning and attachment if necessary.
Counsel mother on feeding a sick child
Accompany mother and child to the health facility
Follow up with client after discharge from health center or hospital
